title: Why do we cry? The three types of tears - Alex Gendler

multiple-choice.question: What is special about Iris's lacrimal glands?

options.label: C
options.text: They produce both basal and reflex tears.

multiple-choice.question: What is the main function of the aqueous layer in Iris's tears?

options.label: A
options.text: To keep dirt and debris away.

options.label: B
options.text: To repel invasive bacteria and protect Iris's skin.

options.label: D
options.text: To prevent the other layers from evaporating.

multiple-choice.question: What happens to the sulfoxides in Onion's jacket when it is removed?

options.label: A
options.text: They convert into a substance that makes Onion smell even better.

options.label: B
options.text: They convert into a substance that stings Iris.

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between basal tears and reflex tears?

options.label: A
options.text: Basal tears are released in larger amounts.

options.label: B
options.text: Reflex tears are released in larger amounts.

multiple-choice.question: Why do scientists think emotional tears may be helpful?

options.label: A
options.text: They may be a social mechanism to elicit sympathy or show submission.

options.label: B
options.text: They may be a way to signal Iris's emotional state to others.

options.label: C
options.text: They may be a way to calm Iris down.

multiple-choice.question: What is the main function of the lipid layer in Iris's tears?

options.label: A
options.text: To keep dirt and debris away.

options.label: B
options.text: To repel invasive bacteria and protect Iris's skin.

options.label: D
options.text: To keep the surface smooth for Iris to see through.

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the substance that is formed when the sulfoxides in Onion's jacket are converted?

What is the main function of the mucus layer in Iris's tears?

options.label: A
options.text: To keep the aqueous layer in place.

options.label: B
options.text: To keep the lipid layer in place.

options.label: C
options.text: To keep the basal tears in place.

options.label: D
options.text: To keep the whole thing fastened to Iris.

multiple-choice.question: Why do Iris and Onion decide to break up?

options.label: C
options.text: Because Iris hurts and cries every time Onion takes off her jacket.
